text: Robert Frederick Hedelund (born March 23, 1961) is a lieutenant general in the United States Marine Corps who serves as the commander of United States Marine Corps Forces Command, replacing LtGen Mark A. Brilakis.https://www.marforcom.marines.mil/Leaders/article-view- display/Article/634186/lieutenant-general-robert-f-hedelund/ He previously served as the commander of the II Marine Expeditionary Force. Hedelund was commissioned upon his graduation from Florida Atlantic University in 1983. He is from Pompano Beach, Florida.https://www.iimef.marines.mil/About/Leaders/Article- View/Article/529479/lieutenant-general-robert-f-hedelund/ ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Florida Atlantic University alumni Category:United States Marine Corps generals
title: Robert F. Hedelund
